# kubemcp.io (Full Index)

> Complete page index for kubemcp.io documentation.

## Canonical LLM Indexes

- [LLMs Index](https://kubemcp.io/llms.txt): Curated, compact index.
- [LLMs Full Index](https://kubemcp.io/llms-full.txt): This full page list.

## Overview

- [Home](https://kubemcp.io/): Project overview and navigation entrypoint.

## Getting Started

- [Installation](https://kubemcp.io/getting-started/installation/): Install CRDs and deploy the operator.
- [Quickstart](https://kubemcp.io/getting-started/quickstart/): Deploy a working MCP server with tools, prompts, and resources.
- [Concepts](https://kubemcp.io/getting-started/concepts/): Reconciliation model and architecture.

## Guides

- [Creating Tools](https://kubemcp.io/guides/creating-tools/): Register callable tool endpoints with `MCPTool`.
- [Multi Tool](https://kubemcp.io/guides/multi-tool/): Define multiple tools via `spec.tools[]`.
- [Prompts and Resources](https://kubemcp.io/guides/prompts-resources/): Add reusable prompts and readable resources.
- [Networking](https://kubemcp.io/guides/networking/): Service exposure and policy guidance.
- [Observability](https://kubemcp.io/guides/observability/): Metrics, logs, health, and status checks.

## Reference

- [MCPServer](https://kubemcp.io/reference/mcpserver/): `MCPServer` CRD reference.
- [MCPTool](https://kubemcp.io/reference/mcptool/): `MCPTool` CRD reference.
- [MCPPrompt](https://kubemcp.io/reference/mcpprompt/): `MCPPrompt` CRD reference.
- [MCPResource](https://kubemcp.io/reference/mcpresource/): `MCPResource` CRD reference.

## Project

- [Roadmap](https://kubemcp.io/project/roadmap/): Planned direction and milestones.
- [Contributing](https://kubemcp.io/project/contributing/): Development workflow and contribution process.
